# ---------------------------------------- # Studies/2019-studies.html # ---------------------------------------- page = page.next page.applyTemplate(template) page.name = 'Prominence' page.url = 'prominence.html'
content = page.select('Content') box = content.newBanner()

from pagebot.constants import * slideshow = content.newSlideShow(h=300, slideW='100%', slideH=300, startIndex=3, autoHeight=True, carousel=2, dynamicHeight=False, transition='slide', easing=CSS_EASE, frameDuration=4, duration=0.7, pauseOnHit=True, randomPlay=False, slidesLeft=True) box = slideshow.side
